tags: no budget mentioned in this data
full_summary:
### PSIB 5A369-234941 Office Furniture - Fontaine Building

#### Tender Details

* Reference Number: WS4261400110
* Solicitation Number: WS4261400110
* Publication Date: 7 November 2023
* Tender Closing Date: 6th December 2023 at 14:00:00 EST
* Amendment Number: 12
* Expected Contract Start Date: 12 January 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A

#### Tender Status

The tender has expired.

#### Contract Scope

Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Department of Indigenous Services, requires the supply of office furniture with delivery and installation on or before 22nd March 2024.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Christopher Finnigan at [christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Tender Documents

Information on how to access the tender documents can be found at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17939132?extsite=MTc5MzkxMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17939132?extsite=MTc5MzkxMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
#### Regions of Opportunity/Supply

The region applicable to this tender is Québec.

Please ensure that all mandatory documentation and bid submissions are submitted by the closing date and time in order to be considered for evaluation.
